title: Crime
lyrics:
I'm on my way, I go where you're going
Leave me astray, there's something about you
Don't cut me off
'Cause baby, we're so good
Together we're so good

Now I ain't going back, where we at

I think about you now, all the time

Now I ain't going back, where you at (where you at)

'Cause baby I just need to tell you



That our love is like the perfect crime

Our love for you and I

Our love for you and I-I-I (I-I-I)

My love for you is so unkind

My love for you and I

My love for you and I-I-I (I-I-I)

Hey



There's no way I'm leaving without you

'Cause I'm addicted to the rush you give me

Don't cut me off

'Cause baby, we're so good (Ah)

Together we're so good (So good, baby)



Now I ain't going back, where we at

I think about you now, all the time

Now I ain't going back, where you at (Where you at)

'Cause baby I just need to tell you (You)



That our love is like the perfect crime

Our love for you and I

Our love for you and I-I-I (I-I-I)

My love for you is so unkind

My love for you and I

My love for you and I-I-I (I-I-I)



So let all go now, I'm on my way

No matter how far, I'm on my way

Our love is like the perfect crime

Our love for you and I

Our love for you and I-I-I



Our love for you and I

Our love for you and I-I-I

Our love is like the perfect crime

Our love for you and I

Our love for you and I-I-I
